{"step_by_step_thinking": "The pharyngeal pouches are part of the embryonic development in vertebrates. The second pharyngeal pouch has two parts: the dorsal and the ventral. The dorsal part of the second pharyngeal pouch gives rise to the palatine tonsil, while the ventral part gives rise to the crypts of the palatine tonsil.", "answer_choice": "A. Tonsils."}
